title: Saving the World and Other Extreme Sports
description: Max and the flock are clearly destined for greatness. Undaunted. Indomitable. Inseparable. But now our six winged heroes are being chased--no, hunted--around the world by a new kind of enemy that is both spectacularly frightening and horrifically perfect. This time, it's they will get caught. So they might as well have some fun
author: James  Patterson
